title: You Got Me 13
body:
Pairing: Single Dad!Peter Parker x Teacher!Reader

Warning: Language. Angst. Hidden pasts. Court things. Stalking (not the creepy kind just the uncomfortable kind). Arguments. Lies. Abusive past, mentioned. Jealousy and protectiveness.

When you met him, it wasn’t love at first sight, not by a long shot. Mutual distaste is more suitable. He’s the father of your favorite student, and not to mention, your neighbor. But a little misunderstanding and a few apologies, you might have misjudged each other. You won’t mention the kiss, he was just saving you. Right? Fate has a funny was of working things out, when you least expect them.
But is that fate knocking on the door, or a nightmare from the past? Everyone has secrets ,and a past sometimes that past comes back around. But who’s past is coming out of the shadows, yours or Peter’s?

Tag List Is Open!!

“Howie has officially met his match.” Peter’s arm is around Y/N’s shoulders, his other arm out stretched and a grin on his face.

“What the hell happened?” Buck laughs, his arm around Nat’s shoulders.

“Y/N fucked his world up tonight. With a careless question.” Peter grins, laughing.

“No shit? What did you do?” Nat looks at Y/N.

“He was being cocky, I put him in his place. I get the impression Howie has the ego of a six year old.” She smirks. “He made a comment about Peter. So, I simply reminded him this is his second date today, and well Meg slapped him.” She shrugs.

“She called him on his shit, I only wish I had been there to see it.” Buck grins.

“I’m Nat.” She puts her hand out to Y/N.

“Y/N.” She grins, as they shake hands.

“Howie looking good.” James chuckles.

“Man she’s got a swing on her.” Howie rubs the side of his face.

“You know my preschoolers sit in the corner when they say things that get them into trouble.” Y/N smirks. “Do you need to sit in the corner or did you learn your lesson?” She tips her head.

“Anyone else take that a little kinky?” Howie looks around. Peter sighs, shaking his head.

“Your brother did, when I threatened him with the same thing for swearing in my class.” She shrugs. Nat lights up, stepping out of Buck’s arm, she links her arm with Y/N’s pulling her towards the pizza shop.

“Please, tell me that story.” Nat grins. Y/N laughs.

“Really?” Howie looks over at him.

“It was the way she said it.” Peter chuckles, shrugging. Buck laughs, slapping him on the back as they follow.



The lights flashed, and the music vibrated through their bodies, the crowd jumped to the beat. Her body swayed against his, her waves shifted as her head moved side to side. Peter laughs as Buck stands around arms folded over his broad chest, his head nods slowly to the music, but his feet remain planted on the floor. Y/N pulls Wanda over to Nat, and the three of them start to dance around Buck, who shakes his head. Hair whirls, hips swing, and they jump up, Buck closes his eyes as hair splays across his chest and arms as they spin around and keep moving.

Howie is between two woman, not far from where they were themselves. Peter’s hand loops around Y/N’s wrist before he spins her back towards him. Buck shakes his head, smirking, she laughs, Nat grins, and he could swear Howie winked at him. Alright so maybe he wasn’t subtle with his attraction to his son’s teacher, but it wasn’t going to stop him.


Your finger was linked with Wanda’s who was linked to Nat, the three of you moving through the packed crowd. Heading for the restroom, a woman slams into the side of you, hard and directed. You let go of Wanda’s hand in time to keep yourself upright. Your eyes land on the woman, she’s got white blonde hair, curled and tied up, strands falling around her face, there was something familiar about her. You had no idea who she was, but something about her face, made you feel like you might know her.

“Bitch.” She sneers, her perfect lips curling up, before she disappears into the crowd.

“Y/N?!” Nat shouts over the music and people.

“Rude people.” You shake your head. Nat grabs your hand pulling you with her. When you’re through the bathroom door you let out a sigh.

“What happened? You were there then you weren’t.” Wanda asks as she checks her make up in the mirror.

“Some woman ran into me. Called me a bitch and walked away.” You shrug.

“Just be glade it wasn’t Peter’s ex. She’s a nasty piece of work.” Nat joins as she leaves the stall, she flips the sink water on.

“Really?” Your head tips.

“She wouldn’t have just run into you, she would have made a huge scene.” She nods as she washes her hands. “Oh, don’t worry, they haven’t been a thing since after Ben was born.” She waves her hand as she dries them.

“His ex is Benny’s mom?” You asks.

“Yeah. It’s a really complicated story. But basically, she bailed on Benny and Peter.” She nods. “I’ve never actually seen him like this before, the way he is with you.” A smile plays over her mouth.

“I wrote out my resignation email today.” You flush pink, tucking a wave behind your ear.

“What?” Wanda and Nat look at you with wide eyes.

“If Clint tells me Monday it’s not allowed. I’m going to resign my position at the school.” You nod.

“Wow, Peter is a lucky fuck.” Nat grins. You couldn’t help the smile on your lips, Wanda links her arm with yours as the three of you leave the bathroom.

You stood outside, Peter’s arm over your shoulders. You, Nat and Wanda were making plans, a baking day with the kids, or going to brunch. Peter shakes his head, a grin on his face.

“Oh we could brunch, and them bake, then I mean let the kids run ramped and sugared up.” Nat grins.

“I like that idea.” You laugh.

“Tomorrow?” Wanda looks between the two of you.

“Yes, say one?” You look at Nat.

“See you then.” Nat grins, as Buck pulls her away. She waves, you laugh as Peter does the same, heading for his car. Wanda disappears into Sam’s car, before you could really say goodbye.

“My place or yours?” Peter asks when he gets in to the car.

“I don’t do this kind of thing normally.” You flush at your confession.

“This isn’t a one night stand kind of thing, Y/N.” Peter smirks as he pulls into traffic. “I’m going to press my luck and I have a backup plan in place, just in case the school disagrees.” He nods.

“Great minds think alike.” You smirk. “I have one myself too.” You grin as he looks over, brow lifted.

trail.content:
Pairing: Single Dad!Peter Parker x Teacher!Reader

Warning: Language. Angst. Hidden pasts. Court things. Stalking (not the creepy kind just the uncomfortable kind). Arguments. Lies. Abusive past, mentioned. Jealousy and protectiveness.

When you met him, it wasn’t love at first sight, not by a long shot. Mutual distaste is more suitable. He’s the father of your favorite student, and not to mention, your neighbor. But a little misunderstanding and a few apologies, you might have misjudged each other. You won’t mention the kiss, he was just saving you. Right? Fate has a funny was of working things out, when you least expect them.
But is that fate knocking on the door, or a nightmare from the past? Everyone has secrets ,and a past sometimes that past comes back around. But who’s past is coming out of the shadows, yours or Peter’s?

Tag List Is Open!!

“Howie has officially met his match.” Peter’s arm is around Y/N’s shoulders, his other arm out stretched and a grin on his face.

“What the hell happened?” Buck laughs, his arm around Nat’s shoulders.

“Y/N fucked his world up tonight. With a careless question.” Peter grins, laughing.

“No shit? What did you do?” Nat looks at Y/N.

“He was being cocky, I put him in his place. I get the impression Howie has the ego of a six year old.” She smirks. “He made a comment about Peter. So, I simply reminded him this is his second date today, and well Meg slapped him.” She shrugs.

“She called him on his shit, I only wish I had been there to see it.” Buck grins.

“I’m Nat.” She puts her hand out to Y/N.

“Y/N.” She grins, as they shake hands.

“Howie looking good.” James chuckles.

“Man she’s got a swing on her.” Howie rubs the side of his face.

“You know my preschoolers sit in the corner when they say things that get them into trouble.” Y/N smirks. “Do you need to sit in the corner or did you learn your lesson?” She tips her head.

“Anyone else take that a little kinky?” Howie looks around. Peter sighs, shaking his head.

“Your brother did, when I threatened him with the same thing for swearing in my class.” She shrugs. Nat lights up, stepping out of Buck’s arm, she links her arm with Y/N’s pulling her towards the pizza shop.

“Please, tell me that story.” Nat grins. Y/N laughs.

“Really?” Howie looks over at him.

“It was the way she said it.” Peter chuckles, shrugging. Buck laughs, slapping him on the back as they follow.



The lights flashed, and the music vibrated through their bodies, the crowd jumped to the beat. Her body swayed against his, her waves shifted as her head moved side to side. Peter laughs as Buck stands around arms folded over his broad chest, his head nods slowly to the music, but his feet remain planted on the floor. Y/N pulls Wanda over to Nat, and the three of them start to dance around Buck, who shakes his head. Hair whirls, hips swing, and they jump up, Buck closes his eyes as hair splays across his chest and arms as they spin around and keep moving.

Howie is between two woman, not far from where they were themselves. Peter’s hand loops around Y/N’s wrist before he spins her back towards him. Buck shakes his head, smirking, she laughs, Nat grins, and he could swear Howie winked at him. Alright so maybe he wasn’t subtle with his attraction to his son’s teacher, but it wasn’t going to stop him.


Your finger was linked with Wanda’s who was linked to Nat, the three of you moving through the packed crowd. Heading for the restroom, a woman slams into the side of you, hard and directed. You let go of Wanda’s hand in time to keep yourself upright. Your eyes land on the woman, she’s got white blonde hair, curled and tied up, strands falling around her face, there was something familiar about her. You had no idea who she was, but something about her face, made you feel like you might know her.

“Bitch.” She sneers, her perfect lips curling up, before she disappears into the crowd.

“Y/N?!” Nat shouts over the music and people.

“Rude people.” You shake your head. Nat grabs your hand pulling you with her. When you’re through the bathroom door you let out a sigh.

“What happened? You were there then you weren’t.” Wanda asks as she checks her make up in the mirror.

“Some woman ran into me. Called me a bitch and walked away.” You shrug.

“Just be glade it wasn’t Peter’s ex. She’s a nasty piece of work.” Nat joins as she leaves the stall, she flips the sink water on.

“Really?” Your head tips.

“She wouldn’t have just run into you, she would have made a huge scene.” She nods as she washes her hands. “Oh, don’t worry, they haven’t been a thing since after Ben was born.” She waves her hand as she dries them.

“His ex is Benny’s mom?” You asks.

“Yeah. It’s a really complicated story. But basically, she bailed on Benny and Peter.” She nods. “I’ve never actually seen him like this before, the way he is with you.” A smile plays over her mouth.

“I wrote out my resignation email today.” You flush pink, tucking a wave behind your ear.

“What?” Wanda and Nat look at you with wide eyes.

“If Clint tells me Monday it’s not allowed. I’m going to resign my position at the school.” You nod.

“Wow, Peter is a lucky fuck.” Nat grins. You couldn’t help the smile on your lips, Wanda links her arm with yours as the three of you leave the bathroom.

You stood outside, Peter’s arm over your shoulders. You, Nat and Wanda were making plans, a baking day with the kids, or going to brunch. Peter shakes his head, a grin on his face.

“Oh we could brunch, and them bake, then I mean let the kids run ramped and sugared up.” Nat grins.

“I like that idea.” You laugh.

“Tomorrow?” Wanda looks between the two of you.

“Yes, say one?” You look at Nat.

“See you then.” Nat grins, as Buck pulls her away. She waves, you laugh as Peter does the same, heading for his car. Wanda disappears into Sam’s car, before you could really say goodbye.

“My place or yours?” Peter asks when he gets in to the car.

“I don’t do this kind of thing normally.” You flush at your confession.

“This isn’t a one night stand kind of thing, Y/N.” Peter smirks as he pulls into traffic. “I’m going to press my luck and I have a backup plan in place, just in case the school disagrees.” He nods.

“Great minds think alike.” You smirk. “I have one myself too.” You grin as he looks over, brow lifted.

Warnings : Language ; grammar/spelling mistakes ; angst

Word Count : 1.9k

Week 1

The first two nights your mother refused to leave your side, even with your father and brother protesting that she need to go home, take a shower and some rest she refused. « I’m not leaving my child. », she stated with such firmness that no one would dare to contradict her. The hospital provided a bed next to yours where she would sleep a few hours but never peacefully.

The medias (TV and social) were going crazy. Searching for every detail regarding your life to know why that women would do what she did. The fans showed support online everyday, not only towards your family but also the Marvel crew. Other celebrities posted messages wishing you would be back soon and showing support to your friends and family. The cast tried to pass by the hospital when they could, but since the press was going to start soon, they had to leave to other states, but they called or texted your brother every single day for updates. Tessa came by as many times as she could, trying to bring you back by telling how her day went, what she wanted you both to experience and do once you’d wake up. Always leaving after pressing a peck on your lips and come back the following day.

On the fourth day, Sebastian came by the hospital. He knocked softly on the door and your mother opened it. « Hello Mrs Williamsons, I’m sorry to disturb, I just wanted to see her. » She gave him a small hug and gesticulating for him to enter. « Hello Sebastian. No problem and please call me Julia. » Sebastian took a seat at your left and couldn’t miss the scars on your broken leg. His breath got stuck in his throat and he swallowed harshly, clenching his jaw. Sensing the man’s emotion, your mother stood up, « Is it alright if I go downstairs grab something to eat? », she told him. He nodded and whispered « Yes of course. I’ll stay here. » She nodded and left. He sat closely and looked at your state. « Hey Y/N, it’s Seb. I don’t know if you can hear me but I’m here with you », his voice cracked. He cleared his throat before continuing. « Everyone misses you…I miss you. So much. » 

He stayed quiet for a few minutes, not sure if he should say what he had in his heart. « We… didn’t know you were with Tessa. It caught us by surprise. Us the ones crushing on you. I should have made a move but was scared. I’m sorry. But right know it’s not important. What matters is that you wake up. We need you…I need you in my life, even if it means we only get to be friends. I wish only the best for you and if being with Tessa makes you happy, then wake up for her. Come back. » The actor felt something wet sliding down his face and noticed that he was crying silently. He cleaned his face with the back of his hand and squeezed your hand gently. Your mother entered again in the room and saw his glossy eyes. She patted affectionally his shoulder and gave him a small smile. He stood up and gave you a slow kiss on your forehead. He said goodbye and left.

Four weeks later and still nothing - no movement, no signs of improvement even if you were stable. The media finally got the reason of the whole accident, since your parents announced publicly that they were suing Carol. The court was due in a week from now and they gained even more support once knowing the whole story - people praising them as good parents and good people since they saved you 27 years ago. Your parents were currently in the court house with their lawyer, preparing for the first trial while your brother was beside your hospital bed. He began to tremble and took your hand. « Y/N it’s enough now. You have to wake the fuck up ! Stop being selfish for the love of God and make us wait like this. Come back ! », he said desperately. His voice began to become louder. « WAKE THE FUCK UP Y/N. WE NEED YOU. DON’T LEAVE US LIKE THIS. PLEASE SISTER, WAKE UP », he said so loudly that a nurse entered the room. « Sir, I have to tell you to leave the room », she said kind of scared. « WAKE UP PLEASE », he said one last time, when he felt your fingers move slightly. He gasped and turned towards the nurse « Her fingers moved. Call a doctor fast, please. » The nurse came closer and looked attentively at your fingers and a few seconds later, they moved again. « Omg », she gasped and ran outside. A minutes after that, the doctor entered and examined you. A bright smile appeared on his face. « Keep talking to her », he told your brother, who’s body was producing tears of joy. « Y/N it’s Marc. Please come back. We miss you so much, please open your eyes. » The pressure of your fingers became harder on his hand and he laughed mixed with tears. « Yes like that sister, come back. »

He took his phone out and called your parents and put on loudspeaker « Marc is everything alright? », your father asked afraid. « She’s…she’s coming back Dad. Her fingers are moving. She’s back. » No response on the other side of the phone. « Dad? ». « We’re..on our way. Thank God. Omg thank you. My baby. », he cried too.

Everything was black and all that noise was unbearable. « Shhh », your mind tried to scream. All that noise and those voices. The darkness began to fade away and a weak light to appear. It was coming closer and closer by the second. You felt your eyes heavy. Everything was blurred but you knew that faces were in front of you, only they were distorted like some Kandinsky painting. Abstract, unrecognizable. Your eyes finally adapted to your surroundings and three people were in front of you. A woman in a blue blouse, a man in a white blouse and a man, crying. Why was he crying and smiling at the same time. ‘This is so confusing’, you thought. « Y/N? », asked the one in white blouse. Your head turned to him and he smiled. « Alright she knows her name, it’s a good sign. »

« Y/N? Do you know who I am? », asked the other man. You opened your mouth but a terrible cough took over. The nurse grabbed a glass filled with water and pressed the cold glass against your lips. Your throat hurt like hell. Their eyes were looking at you like you were the Messiah and it made you uncomfortable. « Do you recognize me? », the man asked again. « Why are you crying Marc? », you answered weakly, confused. « God you scarred the hell out of us », he said. You looked around you and realized you were in a hospital bed, the pointy needle inserted profoundly on your hand. « Tessa…she’s…the airport », you stuttered weakly. « Hey hey don’t worry about that », he immediately calmed you down. « Y/N I’m doctor Smith. What was the last thing you remember? », he asked. The room was silent again before you spoke « I was in the car and then darkness. » He nodded and smiled and asked you if you knew your parents’s names. You frowned and said « Julia and Tom. Why? Where are they? », your heart began to beat faster. « They’re on their way Y/N », replied Marc holding your hand. « I’ve been in the department for 9 years and it’s the first time I see this. It’s a miracle. She remembers », mumbled the doctor and turned towards Marc « We’ll need to run some more tests but what I’m seeing here is promising. »

30 minutes earlier

« Case Williamsons vs Carol Collins. First session is open », exclaimed loudly the Judge and slammed his hammer. The court house was full - family, friends in one side and journalists, reporters and Carol’s lawyer on the other. Behind your parents, were some members of the cast showing them support such as RDJ and Mark Ruffalo with their wives. They let Carol enter the court and the people in the room began to boo her. She walked and looked at your parents with a proud smirk. « SILENCE ! », slammed the Judge with the hammer. The Judge faced Carol and asked her lawyer « Your client is accused of blackmail, harassement and attempted murder, how do you plead? » Carol’s attorney stood up and declared « Not guilty, your Honor! ». His words let out another wave of indignation. Once again he demanded that the room stood silent. The Judge looked at your parents and asked « Do you have any evidence or prouve that goes against this pleading? » Your parents’s attorney stood up and said « Yes your Honor ». He nodded and told them to begin. He was in the middle to show the first evidences against Carol when your father’s phone rang. The Judge seemed annoyed and your father begged him if he could take it. He accepted and after hearing the voice behind, he gasped. Your mother looked at him scarred until he declared « We’re on our way thank God. » He ended the call and addressed the Judge. « Your Honor, my son just told me that Y/N Williamsons, my daughter just woke up from coma. » The room erupted in cheers and the Judge had to calm the euphoria again. « Since the victim is now awake, the trial is suspended for another week. Go join your daughter », exclaimed the Judge. Your parents immediately ran out of the room and got as fast as they could to their car.

In the hospital

« I’ve been in the department for 9 years and it’s the first time I see this. It’s a miracle. She remembers », mumbled the doctor and turned towards Marc « We’ll need to run some more tests but what I’m seeing here is promising. »

You were about to say something when the door opened and parents stormed in. « Baby », cried your mother and embraced you. Confused you patted her back. « Mom? », you whispered. She took your face in her hands and kissed your cheeks. Next was your father. « Anyone care yo explain? », you stated. « Honey, you’ve been in an accident, more or less », your father told you through greeted teeth. « You’ve been in the coma for 5 weeks », continued Mark. You gasped but no words escaped your mouth. « Baby? », said your mother softly. You turned her way and saw clean the remaining tears. « It was Carol. She…she tried to take you from us », your mother revealed. « What? », you whispered. « She was behind the ‘’accident’’. She was furious when we cut the money so she wanted to make us suffer by taking your life », continued your father. You tried to say something but nothing came out. Was it shock? Was it bewilderment that she could go that far for cash? You didn’t know. The only thing you knew was that she was bad and that you were going to drag her fucking ass to jail. « I’m sorry », was the only thing that you could say. « No no no honey, it’s not your fault. It’s hers. She will pay for what she did. Trust me », replied your father firmly.

« Tessa? », you asked. Mark smiled and said « I already send a group message to the whole cast. RDJ and Ruffallo are already in the waiting room. They were present at the court. » You nodded and hugged as good as you could your parents and brother.

Next was your father. « Anyone care yo explain? », you stated. « Honey, you’ve been in an accident, more or less », your father told you through greeted teeth. « You’ve been in the coma for 5 weeks », continued Mark. You gasped but no words escaped your mouth. « Baby? », said your mother softly. You turned her way and saw clean the remaining tears. « It was Carol. She…she tried to take you from us », your mother revealed. « What? », you whispered. « She was behind the ‘’accident’’. She was furious when we cut the money so she wanted to make us suffer by taking your life », continued your father. You tried to say something but nothing came out. Was it shock? Was it bewilderment that she could go that far for cash? You didn’t know. The only thing you knew was that she was bad and that you were going to drag her fucking ass to jail. « I’m sorry », was the only thing that you could say. « No no no honey, it’s not your fault. It’s hers. She will pay for what she did. Trust me », replied your father firmly.

« Tessa? », you asked. Mark smiled and said « I already send a group message to the whole cast. RDJ and Ruffallo are already in the waiting room. They were present at the court. » You nodded and hugged as good as you could your parents and brother.

trail.content:
Rio pra não chorar - Part 7

Pairing : Tessa Thompson x Plus Size Reader

Warnings : Language ; grammar/spelling mistakes ; angst

Word Count : 1.9k

Week 1

The first two nights your mother refused to leave your side, even with your father and brother protesting that she need to go home, take a shower and some rest she refused. « I’m not leaving my child. », she stated with such firmness that no one would dare to contradict her. The hospital provided a bed next to yours where she would sleep a few hours but never peacefully.

The medias (TV and social) were going crazy. Searching for every detail regarding your life to know why that women would do what she did. The fans showed support online everyday, not only towards your family but also the Marvel crew. Other celebrities posted messages wishing you would be back soon and showing support to your friends and family. The cast tried to pass by the hospital when they could, but since the press was going to start soon, they had to leave to other states, but they called or texted your brother every single day for updates. Tessa came by as many times as she could, trying to bring you back by telling how her day went, what she wanted you both to experience and do once you’d wake up. Always leaving after pressing a peck on your lips and come back the following day.

On the fourth day, Sebastian came by the hospital. He knocked softly on the door and your mother opened it. « Hello Mrs Williamsons, I’m sorry to disturb, I just wanted to see her. » She gave him a small hug and gesticulating for him to enter. « Hello Sebastian. No problem and please call me Julia. » Sebastian took a seat at your left and couldn’t miss the scars on your broken leg. His breath got stuck in his throat and he swallowed harshly, clenching his jaw. Sensing the man’s emotion, your mother stood up, « Is it alright if I go downstairs grab something to eat? », she told him. He nodded and whispered « Yes of course. I’ll stay here. » She nodded and left. He sat closely and looked at your state. « Hey Y/N, it’s Seb. I don’t know if you can hear me but I’m here with you », his voice cracked. He cleared his throat before continuing. « Everyone misses you…I miss you. So much. » 

He stayed quiet for a few minutes, not sure if he should say what he had in his heart. « We… didn’t know you were with Tessa. It caught us by surprise. Us the ones crushing on you. I should have made a move but was scared. I’m sorry. But right know it’s not important. What matters is that you wake up. We need you…I need you in my life, even if it means we only get to be friends. I wish only the best for you and if being with Tessa makes you happy, then wake up for her. Come back. » The actor felt something wet sliding down his face and noticed that he was crying silently. He cleaned his face with the back of his hand and squeezed your hand gently. Your mother entered again in the room and saw his glossy eyes. She patted affectionally his shoulder and gave him a small smile. He stood up and gave you a slow kiss on your forehead. He said goodbye and left.

Four weeks later and still nothing - no movement, no signs of improvement even if you were stable. The media finally got the reason of the whole accident, since your parents announced publicly that they were suing Carol. The court was due in a week from now and they gained even more support once knowing the whole story - people praising them as good parents and good people since they saved you 27 years ago. Your parents were currently in the court house with their lawyer, preparing for the first trial while your brother was beside your hospital bed. He began to tremble and took your hand. « Y/N it’s enough now. You have to wake the fuck up ! Stop being selfish for the love of God and make us wait like this. Come back ! », he said desperately. His voice began to become louder. « WAKE THE FUCK UP Y/N. WE NEED YOU. DON’T LEAVE US LIKE THIS. PLEASE SISTER, WAKE UP », he said so loudly that a nurse entered the room. « Sir, I have to tell you to leave the room », she said kind of scared. « WAKE UP PLEASE », he said one last time, when he felt your fingers move slightly. He gasped and turned towards the nurse « Her fingers moved. Call a doctor fast, please. » The nurse came closer and looked attentively at your fingers and a few seconds later, they moved again. « Omg », she gasped and ran outside. A minutes after that, the doctor entered and examined you. A bright smile appeared on his face. « Keep talking to her », he told your brother, who’s body was producing tears of joy. « Y/N it’s Marc. Please come back. We miss you so much, please open your eyes. » The pressure of your fingers became harder on his hand and he laughed mixed with tears. « Yes like that sister, come back. »

He took his phone out and called your parents and put on loudspeaker « Marc is everything alright? », your father asked afraid. « She’s…she’s coming back Dad. Her fingers are moving. She’s back. » No response on the other side of the phone. « Dad? ». « We’re..on our way. Thank God. Omg thank you. My baby. », he cried too.

Everything was black and all that noise was unbearable. « Shhh », your mind tried to scream. All that noise and those voices. The darkness began to fade away and a weak light to appear. It was coming closer and closer by the second. You felt your eyes heavy. Everything was blurred but you knew that faces were in front of you, only they were distorted like some Kandinsky painting. Abstract, unrecognizable. Your eyes finally adapted to your surroundings and three people were in front of you. A woman in a blue blouse, a man in a white blouse and a man, crying. Why was he crying and smiling at the same time. ‘This is so confusing’, you thought. « Y/N? », asked the one in white blouse. Your head turned to him and he smiled. « Alright she knows her name, it’s a good sign. »

« Y/N? Do you know who I am? », asked the other man. You opened your mouth but a terrible cough took over. The nurse grabbed a glass filled with water and pressed the cold glass against your lips. Your throat hurt like hell. Their eyes were looking at you like you were the Messiah and it made you uncomfortable. « Do you recognize me? », the man asked again. « Why are you crying Marc? », you answered weakly, confused. « God you scarred the hell out of us », he said. You looked around you and realized you were in a hospital bed, the pointy needle inserted profoundly on your hand. « Tessa…she’s…the airport », you stuttered weakly. « Hey hey don’t worry about that », he immediately calmed you down. « Y/N I’m doctor Smith. What was the last thing you remember? », he asked. The room was silent again before you spoke « I was in the car and then darkness. » He nodded and smiled and asked you if you knew your parents’s names. You frowned and said « Julia and Tom. Why? Where are they? », your heart began to beat faster. « They’re on their way Y/N », replied Marc holding your hand. « I’ve been in the department for 9 years and it’s the first time I see this. It’s a miracle. She remembers », mumbled the doctor and turned towards Marc « We’ll need to run some more tests but what I’m seeing here is promising. »

30 minutes earlier

« Case Williamsons vs Carol Collins. First session is open », exclaimed loudly the Judge and slammed his hammer. The court house was full - family, friends in one side and journalists, reporters and Carol’s lawyer on the other. Behind your parents, were some members of the cast showing them support such as RDJ and Mark Ruffalo with their wives. They let Carol enter the court and the people in the room began to boo her. She walked and looked at your parents with a proud smirk. « SILENCE ! », slammed the Judge with the hammer. The Judge faced Carol and asked her lawyer « Your client is accused of blackmail, harassement and attempted murder, how do you plead? » Carol’s attorney stood up and declared « Not guilty, your Honor! ». His words let out another wave of indignation. Once again he demanded that the room stood silent. The Judge looked at your parents and asked « Do you have any evidence or prouve that goes against this pleading? » Your parents’s attorney stood up and said « Yes your Honor ». He nodded and told them to begin. He was in the middle to show the first evidences against Carol when your father’s phone rang. The Judge seemed annoyed and your father begged him if he could take it. He accepted and after hearing the voice behind, he gasped. Your mother looked at him scarred until he declared « We’re on our way thank God. » He ended the call and addressed the Judge. « Your Honor, my son just told me that Y/N Williamsons, my daughter just woke up from coma. » The room erupted in cheers and the Judge had to calm the euphoria again. « Since the victim is now awake, the trial is suspended for another week. Go join your daughter », exclaimed the Judge. Your parents immediately ran out of the room and got as fast as they could to their car.

In the hospital

« I’ve been in the department for 9 years and it’s the first time I see this. It’s a miracle. She remembers », mumbled the doctor and turned towards Marc « We’ll need to run some more tests but what I’m seeing here is promising. »

You were about to say something when the door opened and parents stormed in. « Baby », cried your mother and embraced you. Confused you patted her back. « Mom? », you whispered. She took your face in her hands and kissed your cheeks. Next was your father. « Anyone care yo explain? », you stated. « Honey, you’ve been in an accident, more or less », your father told you through greeted teeth. « You’ve been in the coma for 5 weeks », continued Mark. You gasped but no words escaped your mouth. « Baby? », said your mother softly. You turned her way and saw clean the remaining tears. « It was Carol. She…she tried to take you from us », your mother revealed. « What? », you whispered. « She was behind the ‘’accident’’. She was furious when we cut the money so she wanted to make us suffer by taking your life », continued your father. You tried to say something but nothing came out. Was it shock? Was it bewilderment that she could go that far for cash? You didn’t know. The only thing you knew was that she was bad and that you were going to drag her fucking ass to jail. « I’m sorry », was the only thing that you could say. « No no no honey, it’s not your fault. It’s hers. She will pay for what she did. Trust me », replied your father firmly.

« Tessa? », you asked. Mark smiled and said « I already send a group message to the whole cast. RDJ and Ruffallo are already in the waiting room. They were present at the court. » You nodded and hugged as good as you could your parents and brother.
